QuestData.Title: News from Nagrand
QuestData.Description:
Welcome back, $gsir:mam;.
One of our shadow hunters delivered a message about a caravan being dispatched for Nagrand. Rokhan's awaiting your approval on a new outpost.
I've been hearing whispers around camp about Nagrand. They say it's Warsong territory. They might need your help $gsir:mam;.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Rokhan at your garrison in Frostfire Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText:
Boss-mon. Good to have ya back.
We been seein' some movement in Nagrand. Let me give ya the details.
